summary: Save your position in a timeline

request.name: Authorization
request.comment: REQUIRED Provide this header with Bearer <user token> to gain authorized access to this API method.

request.name: home[last_read_id]
request.comment: String. ID of the last status read in the home timeline.

request.name: notifications[last_read_id]
request.comment: String. ID of the last notification read.
